//LunOS -- Lunar Operating System
//math -- Mathematic utilities

//Just some basic mathematical stuff.

#ifndef LUNOS_MATH
#define LUNOS_MATH

char FTrunc(float value) {
    FINT value;
    return value;
}

float FMax(float a, float b) {
    MAX a, b;
    return a;
}

float FMin(float a, float b) {
    MIN a, b;
    return a;
}

#endif
